title: Breaches by Iran-Affiliated Hackers Spanned Multiple U.S. States, Federal Agencies Say
description:
The Municipal Water Authority of Aliquippa was just one of multiple organizations breached in the U.S. by Iran-linked "Cyber Av3ngers" hackers

The post Breaches by Iran-Affiliated Hackers Spanned Multiple U.S. States, Federal Agencies Say appeared first on SecurityWeek.
